com.kylecorry.geometry

Class Quaternion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kylecorry.geometry.Quaternion

  • public class Quaternion
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a rotation in 3D space.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion(double w,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double z)
        Create a quaternion with the w, x, y, and z components.
        Parameters:
        w - The w component.
        x - The x component.
        y - The y component.
        z - The z component.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion(double theta,
                  Vector3 axis)
        Create a quaternion from an angle and an axis.
        Parameters:
        theta - The angle of rotation in radians around an axis.
        axis - The axis of rotation.

    • Method Detail

      • inverse

        public Quaternion inverse()
        Create the inverse of the quaternion.
        Returns:
        The inverse of this quaternion.

      • multiply

        public Quaternion multiply(Quaternion other)
        Multiply two quaternions together.
        Parameters:
        other - The quaternion to multiply with this one.
        Returns:
        The product of the quaternions.

      • multiply

        public Quaternion multiply(Point point)
        Multiply a quaternion by a point.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to multiply with this quaternion.
        Returns:
        The product of the quaternion and the point.

      • multiply

        public Quaternion multiply(Vector3 axis)
        Multiply a quaternion by an axis as a vector.
        Parameters:
        axis - The vector to multiply this quaternion by.
        Returns:
        The product of the quaternion and the vector.

      • rotate

        public Point rotate(Point p)
        Rotate a point by the quaternion.
        Parameters:
        p - The point to rotate.
        Returns:
        The point, rotated by the quaternion.
